## rclone cachestats

Print cache stats for a remote

### Synopsis


Print cache stats for a remote in JSON format


```
rclone cachestats source: [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for cachestats
```

See the [global flags page](/flags/) for global options not listed here.
